action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a bedroom. There is a queen-sized bed with white linens and two white pillows. Above the bed is a dark-colored headboard and a set of three abstract paintings – each a square canvas with red and black coloring. On either side of the bed are small, round glass tables with silver bases, each holding a lamp and a phone. The walls are white and the floor is hardwood.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a bedroom with a large, dark wood bed as the focal point. The bed has a detailed headboard and is covered with a patterned, gold and brown bedspread and several decorative pillows. There are matching bedside tables with lamps on either side of the bed. A framed picture hangs on the wall above the bed. The walls are a neutral beige color and the floor is carpeted.

Above the bed is a dark-colored headboard and a set of three abstract paintings – each a square canvas with red and black coloring.
